Bindings.Binding: if IGAS.UIParent.Cube_Main then IGAS.UIParent.Cube_Main.Visible = not IGAS.UIParent.Cube_Main.Visible end
if IGAS.UIParent.Cube_Debug then IGAS.UIParent.Cube_Debug.Visible = not IGAS.UIParent.Cube_Debug.Visible end
if IGAS.UIParent.Cube_BugList then IGAS.UIParent.Cube_BugList.Visible = not IGAS.UIParent.Cube_BugList.Visible end
if IGAS.UIParent.Cube_LogView then IGAS.UIParent.Cube_LogView.Visible = not IGAS.UIParent.Cube_LogView.Visible end
if IGAS.UIParent.Cube_Browser then IGAS.UIParent.Cube_Browser.Visible = not IGAS.UIParent.Cube_Browser.Visible end
